sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Russia steps up its assault on occupied Ukrainian territories as civilians from recaptured towns in the Kherson region return home.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Russia's economy is doing better than expected, with its central bank deciding to keep interest rates at 7.5%, partially due to high energy prices.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Iran's anti-government protests continue for a sixth week after the death of Masa Amini with administrative buildings set on fire in multiple cities.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: At least four people have been killed and ten wounded after Russian missiles struck several towns near the Zaporizhia power plant. Dozens of residential buildings were damaged and power lines cut, leaving thousands without electricity. Russia's Defense Ministry says its forces have repelled Ukrainian attacks and destroyed five ammunition depots in the Kharkiv region and in the self-proclaimed Donetsk People's Republic.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: In the Kupyansk direction, one enemy-reinforced battalion attacked the positions of Russian troops towards Birstov.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: All the attacks were repelled.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Over 150 Ukrainian personnel, one tank, five infantry fighting vehicles, four armored personnel carriers and nine pickups were eliminated.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy says Russia has launched more than 8,000 airstrikes and fired some 4,500 missiles since the war began.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Standing beside the wreckage of a downed Iranian drone, he vowed that Putin's attacks on power plants would not break Ukrainian spirits.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: But according to Zelensky's military, drones have played a key role in helping defending troops destroy Russian missile launchers.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: This pilot claims they are not bombing, but searching and targeting weapons on Russian soil, which he says are attacking our city.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: So we fly not only to Russian border, we fly very deep into Russian territory, and because they are shooting from there.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, reclaimed settlements in the Kherson region bear the heavy scars of the war.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Many civilians have now returned, but for some, piles of bricks and mortar are all that remain of their former homes.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Russia's economy is doing better than expected.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Its central bank has kept interest rates at 7.5% after forecasting a 3.5% economic contraction this year, almost a full point less than the World Bank predicted three weeks ago.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Official forecasts see the country remaining in recession in 2023, with a contraction of between 1 and 4%, although it expects the country to return to a growth path by the end of that year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Some experts question the optimism of the Central Bank of Russia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Despite suffering the impact of sanctions imposed by the international community after invading Ukraine and the withdrawal of hundreds of Western companies, the Russian economy has benefited for months from high energy prices.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: However, experts predict this effect may reduce as the global economy slows down and brings energy prices. However, experts predict this effect may reduce as the global economy slows down and brings energy prices with it. The West is also quickly finding new alternatives for Russia's energy exports. As a result, it may lose 1 trillion euros in hydrocarbon sales between now and 2030, according to the International Energy Agency's estimates.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: These videos show multiple women cutting their hair over the grave of Nika Shakerami in Iran at a memorial to honour the 38 days since her death.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Her body was found after attending an early protest over the death of Masha Amini, who was arrested by the Morality Police for an alleged breach of the Islamic Republic's strict dress code for women.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: In this video, protesters chant death to the dictator as a fire burns at a regional government office.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: In the capital too, protesters chanted anti-government slogans.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The unrest has now entered a sixth week after Masha Amini's death and is only gaining strength, with a struggling economy and falling living standards motivating many to come out, too.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, some people in Tehran condemned a separate mass shooting at a Shia shrine in the southern city of Shiraz that killed at least 15 people.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The Islamic State terrorist group, who are officially Sunni, claimed responsibility. North Korea fired two short-range ballistic missiles over the sea on Friday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The U.S. military said the launches did not pose an immediate threat to the United States or its allies, but highlighted the destabilizing impact of North Korea's illicit weapon programs.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: impact of North Korea's illicit weapon programs next week South Korean and US air forces plan to conduct yet another large-scale military training Pyongyang see such regular drills as practice for an attack on the north though the allies say their exercises are purely defensive an election recount in Bosnia and Herzegovina has confirmed Milorad are purely defensive.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: An election recount in Bosnia and Herzegovina has confirmed Milorad Dodik's victory over his challenger, who accused him of vote rigging.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Dodik, a Bosnian Serb hardliner, said he hoped the election saga was over.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The Central Election Commission said the repeated count revealed many irregularities but that none were on a level that would have changed the outcome of the vote on

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: the last day when public acts or rallies are allowed in the Brazilian presidential campaign Lula da Silva chose to give interviews and to release an open letter it's called a letter for tomorrow's Brazil it commits in the event of a victory to create a government that brings together fiscal responsibility, social responsibility and sustainable development.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile the incumbent, Jair Bolsonaro, went through Rio de Janeiro and took the opportunity to ask the crowd that followed him if they intended to return to the past or continue on a path of peace and work.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Yet Bolsonaro is the slight underdog here.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The most recent poll by the Deita Fola Institute gives 53% of the vote to Lula and 47% to his rival.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: But then, polls have been wrong before.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: In the first round, the forecast placed the incumbent president far behind Lula.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: In the end, only 5% separated the two candidates.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Bolsonaro has stoked fears that the election will be rigged against him, making unfounded allegations about Brazil's electronic voting system, which has previously been shown to be reliable.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: On Sunday, Brazilians will vote in one of the closest and most vitriolic elections in modern times, with two completely different paths for the country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The world's richest man has finally taken control over Twitter after months of controversy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Elon Musk tweeted after the 44 billion euro deal saying the bird is freed, referencing the app's logo and nodding to previous plans to cut back on moderating content on the platform, potentially opening the floodgates for more abuse online.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: He also changed his bio on the platform to chief tweet.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Shortly after the takeover, Musk fired several top executives at one of the world's most influential social media platforms. The South African billionaire said on Twitter that he wanted to create a place where a wide range of beliefs can be debated in a healthy manner.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Musk could make major changes to the website, such as creating a subscription service and reinstating banned accounts, such as the one belonging to former U.S. President Donald Trump. Musk is expected to speak with Twitter employees on Friday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Germany is helping to rebuild Notre Dame de Paris.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Four stained glass windows from the burnt-out cathedral are currently being restored in this master glassmaker's workshop in Cologne.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Although the fire did not damage the stained glass, the colored windows are now blackened by soot.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: It was something special to receive these pieces of stained glass, because it was linked to a lot of emotions. The pieces themselves are one thing, but there is also a lot of soul in this project, and of course we also felt it here in the workshop when we unpacked the pieces.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Restoring the fire-blackened windows is a very delicate task as the day of reopening approaches.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The fire did not cause any damage to the windows.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Unfortunately a lot of breakage has to be repaired with silicone glue and of course we are short of time.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: We have to move forward as quickly as possible and with the best quality to put these stained glass windows back in Notre Dame next spring. pour pouvoir arriver Ã  remettre ces vitraux dans Notre-Dame au printemps prochain.
